alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Tarrant (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 2:41PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Tarrant and northwestern Dallas Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 240 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Grand Prairie, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dallas, Fort Worth, Arlington, Irving, Grand Prairie, Mesquite, Carrollton, Euless, Desoto, Cedar Hill, Coppell, Duncanville, Farmers Branch, University Park, Addison, Highland Park, Cockrell Hill, Pantego, Cedar Hill State Park and Dallas Love Field. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35E between mile markers 420 and 443. Interstate 20 between mile markers 449 and 464. Interstate 30 between mile markers 26 and 56. Interstate 45 between mile markers 280 and 284. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
